title: Youtube Beam
name: youtubesharingplugin
description: Allows the fast sharing of youtube videos to connected devices.
author: George Aleksandrovich

preferences.name: deviceName
preferences.title: Public Device Name
preferences.description: This is the name that appears to other devices.

preferences.name: deviceID
preferences.title: Device ID
preferences.description: An ID that uniquely identifies this device. NOTE: You cannot change this value. Any modification made here will NOT be saved.

preferences.name: deviceList
preferences.title: Saved Devices
preferences.description: A list of devices that appear when you click on the addon button. Separate multiple entries with spaces, commas, or semicolons.
